org.mini2Dx.ui.render

Class ParentRenderNode<T extends ParentUiElement,S extends ParentStyleRule>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.ui.render.RenderNode<T,S>
      • org.mini2Dx.ui.render.ParentRenderNode<T,S>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HoverableRenderNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ButtonRenderNode, ColumnRenderNode, ContainerRenderNode, RowRenderNode, ScrollBoxRenderNode, TabViewRenderNode, UiContainerRenderTree

    public abstract class ParentRenderNode<T extends ParentUiElement,S extends ParentStyleRule>
extends RenderNode<T,S>
    Base class for RenderNode implementations that contains child nodes
